response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a symbol of excellence and a testament to craftsmanship. Given its significance, I am extending to you an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a price of $2,000,000. I believe its true worth far exceeds this amount, but I am willing to negotiate based on your assessment of its value to you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing of the product. I look forward to your response and hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 2000000}
